details:
A library to support the Internationalised Domain Names in Applications (IDNA) protocol as specified in RFC 5891 http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5891. This version of the protocol is often referred to as “IDNA2008” and can produce different results from the earlier standard from 2003.

Security Fix(es):

A flaw was found in the python-idna library. A malicious argument was sent to the idna.encode() function can trigger an uncontrolled resource consumption, resulting in a denial of service.(CVE-2024-3651)
